answers.answer: Aww I'm sorry I'm scared to know if I do I go in wed to see
Good luck! I have a doctors appt tomorrow morning and she's going to talk to me more about it. Im nervous and depressed about it :((
I have it as well. I wasn't expecting it :(
What is it & why is it bad :/
Im so bummed :/ I dont know a whole entire lot about it so I cant tell you much :/ I'm googling it now and I'll get more info tomorrow at my doctors appointment

I have it too.. I have to test my blood four times a day, but you get use to it.Just watch your diet and you should be fine you might need insulin if it's bad though.You will be fine, it will go away once you Give birth.
I had it and I had to check bloods 3x times a day plus self inject insulin. All you really have to do is maintain a healthy diet. It goes away after labour.
Are your babies okay? Did you have to get induced?
I get tested in exactly 12 hours. Didn't have it with multiple first, but I'm scared this time.
My aunt had 3kids and didnt find out she had it until after her second 10lb baby..they are healthy lol
My* not multiple.
My heart broke when I got the phone call from my doctor with my results. I was at work and started bawling!! I feel like I've failed my baby and put his health in danger.
Oh god I don't want to have a 10 lb baby lol
:( Oh my and here I am being a snack queen
I was doing the same!:/
How long did it take for them to call you with your results? I took the test and I feel like I might have it because of how often I give into my sugar cravings!
I took the test Wed morning and my doctor called me today around noon

I wouldn't worry too much about it. I had it and my doctor never even told me. My son was perfectly healthy the whole pregnancy. The only thing was he turned out to be a large baby. but he is more than perfect other wise! (: so just be sure to watch what you eat. It'll all be okay. (:
I was induced 2 weeks early, he only weighed 6pounds 10ounces! He was perfect, no complications whatsoever :)
Just because you have gestational diabetes doesn't mean you will have a big baby. Don't worry to much! xx
